mapper.select: SELECT * from environment WHERE device_name = #{deviceName} ORDER BY gmt_created DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT d.name as device_name, e.id, e.co, e.fire, e.humidity, e.risk, e.smoke, e.temperature, e.gmt_created, e.gmt_modified FROM device d LEFT JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT * FROM environment env WHERE env.device_name = d.name ORDER BY env.gmt_created DESC LIMIT 1 ) e ON true
